text: Meituan takeaway privacy policy
Update date: October 28, 2021
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: November 4, 2021

Meituan takeaway (following or "we") pays great attention to protecting the personal information and privacy of users ("you"). We know the importance of personal information to you and will follow the requirements of laws and regulations and the industry's mature security standards.Take corresponding security measures to protect your personal information.
We hope to clearly introduce you how to deal with your personal information and protect you when using our products/services through this privacy policy.
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. How do you manage your personal information
6. Protection of personal information of minors
7. Notification and revision
8. How to contact us
9. Appendix
[Special Tips] Please read and fully understand this "Privacy Policy" (the key content has bolded the fonts, please pay special attention to the use of the products/services we provided by us.
Once you use or continue to use our products/services, it means that you agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: Once you use or continue to use our products/services, it means that you agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.

text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the way how to contact us in this privacy policy).

The product/service of "Meituan Takeaway" is Beijing San Kuang Online Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties provided to you through the following routes: including but not limited to the Meituan takeaway website (https: // wait.Meituan.com or Meituan takeaway according to the URL of business needs), Meituan takeaway APP and other clients, as well as related WeChat open platform accounts or applets.
The Meituan takeaway and its related parties referred to this policy referUnclated companies are named or collectively known as.
label: Contact Information

text: Please note that this policy is not applicable to other third -party products/services connected by your products/services ("Other third parties", including your trading counterparty, any third -party website, and third -party service providerWait), please refer to the privacy policy or similar statement of the third party.
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
When you use our products/services, you need/you can choose to authorize us to collect and use personal information.
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to provide you with the basic functions of our product/service- "Catering purchase and delivery", you need to authorize us to collect and use the necessary personal information. The necessary personal information includes "mobile phone number, the consignee's name, address, connectionPay information such as telephone, payment time, payment amount, payment channels.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You need to authorize us to collect and use the necessary personal information. The necessary personal information includes payment information such as "mobile phone number, consignee name, address, contact phone number, payment time, payment amount, payment channels, etc.

text: If you refuse to provide the above necessary information, you will not be able to use our product/service normally;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide the above necessary information, you will not be able to use our products/services normally.

text: 2. In order to provide you with the expansion function or additional function of our product/service, you can choose to authorize us to collect and use your other personal information. If you refuse to provide the aforementioned information, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve usThe functional effects intended to be achieved will not affect your basic function of using our product/service normally.

First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You can choose to authorize us to collect and use your other personal information. If you refuse to provide the aforementioned information, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or to achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, but it will not affect your normal use of our product/Basic functions of service.

text: (1) You need to authorize us to collect and use personal information.
We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary, and use your personal information for the following purposes described in this policy.
label: Usage

text: 1. Help you become our user
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We provide you with a service through Meituan account. When you register as our user, you need to provide at least mobile phone numbers to create Meituan account (Meituan takeaway use Meituan account system.Meituan takeaway), and improve the relevant network identification information (such as avatars, nicknames, login passwords, etc.), after you authorize the Meituan account to log in to Meituan takeaway, we will obtain relevant account information based on your authorization (such as user logo logo, Nickname, avatar, login status information, etc.);

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you register as our user, you need to provide at least mobile phone numbers to create Meituan account and improve the relevant network identity information.

text: If you only need to use the browse function, you don't need to register as our users and provide the above information.

If you choose to log in with a third -party account, we will obtain the account information you shared (such as avatars, nicknames, regions, gender and other information, etc.) from third parties to your Meituan account for quick login. We willAccording to the agreement with the third party, use your personal information on the premise of complied with relevant regulations.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will obtain your shared account information (such as avatar, nickname, region, gender and other information, etc.) from a third party to bind to your Meituan account for quick login.

text: 2. Provide you with geographic location -based information display

In order to provide you with the display and search service of the surrounding goods/services, and improve our service performance, efficiency and functions, after you authorize, we will collect the relevant information you generate in the process of using our service, including:
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Location information.
label: First Party Collection Information

Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: We also need to show you all kinds of exclusive activities and merchant stores where you can participate in your own position and merchant stores that can participate in.Relying on location information, if you do not provide location information, you cannot show you the current effective activities, available merchant stores and other services).

text: 3. Provide you with order and order management function

When you place orders for food, dessert beverages, supermarket convenience, vegetables and fruits, medicine delivery, and other services in Meituan takeaway, you need to provide contact information (name, gender, phone number, etc.), address information (name, gender, phone number, etc.), address information (name, gender, phone number, etc.), address information (name, gender, phone number, etc.)Receiving address), service preferences (such as the number of dining people), etc.

First Party Collection Information

In order to facilitate your management of your own preferences, find users or communities with common hobbies, get a easier access experience, and share with friends and third parties.You can also share information with third parties through functional components. When you use the corresponding functions on Meituan takeaway involved in distribution/replacement (such as invoice mail)/running legs (such as help buying help) service, you need to provide the name of the collection/consigneeIt is called you, such as Ms. Liu), mobile phone numbers, and receiving addresses, so that your order can be delivered and completed safely and accurately.

When you actively evaluate the merchant's products/services or publish other content on the Meituan takeaway, we will collect the information you posted and show your nickname, avatar and publishing content.

7. Help you complete the payment

When you pay for order on Meituan Takeaway, you can choose Meituan Takeaway and its related parties (such as Meituan Pay) or Meituan takeaway third -party cooperation agencies (such as WeChat payment, QQ wallet, Apple Pay, Alipay and other cooperationFang) The service provided for payment.

Important

text: (1) After authorization, when you have a service dispute with the merchant and the rider, the platform can retrieve and use recording information as the basis for the reference of the dispute.

text: (2) The platform will effectively ensure the privacy and security of the two parties. The recording will be uploaded to the Meituan server to save, and all parties cannot download, retrieve or play recording by themselves;

Important

text: Except for the following circumstances, the platform will not provide the recording to anyone (including the master of the call, the name of the call): a.

text: b. The recording of the legal documents issued by the judicial organs was retrieved according to law.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: (3) After 7 days of preservation, the recording will automatically delete permanently. In case of bad reviews, complaints, disputes that have not been completed, the platform will appropriately extend the periodic of the recording preservation.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After 7 days of preservation, the recording will automatically delete permanently. If there are poor reviews, complaints, disputes that have not yet been handled, the platform will appropriately extend the period of recording preservation.

text: (4) Limited by the stability of the network status, in extreme cases, there may be unable to recording or some recording failure.
It may also be encountered in the case of number protection. Your real mobile phone number will be displayed to merchants and riders to ensure that merchants and riders can deliver you for you.

In order to ensure your account security, transaction security, and system operation security, to meet the requirements of laws and regulations and our agreement rules, in the process of accessing and using our products/service, you authorize us to obtain your equipment information, including your equipment information, includingThe device model, hardware serial number, device MAC address, unique device recognition code (such as IMEI/Android/Openudid/OAID/OAID, SIM card IMSI, ICCID information and other device identifiers), mobile application list, telecommunications operationsCharacter soft hardware feature information, sensor information.

text: (6) Equipment rights adjustment

In order to ensure the normal implementation of the relevant business functions, we need to call the corresponding permissions according to the specific use scenarios, and inquire with you before calling. Please refer to the table below for specific authority calling instructions:

1. Data security measures

text: 4. Safety events

After unfortunately a personal information security incident, we will immediately set up a special emergency group to start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security incidents. text: 7. Notification and revision
In order to provide you with better services, our business will change from time to time, and this privacy policy will be adjusted.If our contact information is changed, we will update it in time.
label: Policy Change

text: Without your clear consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy in accordance with the privacy policy.
label: Policy Change

text: We will send a update version on our website and mobile terminals or remind you to update the relevant content in other ways. Please also visit us to understand the latest privacy policy in time.
label: Policy Change

text: In the foregoing, if you continue to use our services, you will agree to accept the revised policy and be bound.
label: Risk
Policy Change

text: 8. How to contact us
You can contact us in the following ways, we will answer your request within 15 days;
1. You can contact us through the online contact information provided by Meituan takeaway website (https://waiimai.meituan.com)/Meituan takeaway app/online customer service system to contact us.

text: appendix:

1. Personal information: Refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information to identify a specific natural person or reflect the activity of specific natural persons alone or with other information.
Personal information that may involve in this privacy policy includes, but not limited to: personal information (including name, phone number, gender, address, birthday, birthday, etc.);
Personal identity information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, etc.);
Network identity identification information (including system accounts, IP addresses, mailbox addresses, and the answer to the aforementioned password, password, password protection);
Personal property information (including bank accounts, transactions and consumption records, credit records, and virtual property information, etc.);
Personal health and physiological information (including diseases, medical records, history, etc.);
Contact information (including address book information, friends list, etc.);
Personal Internet records (including website browsing records, click records, etc.);
Personal device information (including information that describes the basic situation of individual equipment such as the unique device identification code);
Personal location information (including the trajectory, precise positioning information, etc.).

2. Personal sensitive information: It refers to personal information that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information that causes personal reputation, physical and mental health, or discriminatory treatment.

Personal sensitive information that may be involved in this privacy policy includes: personal identity certification information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, student IDs, etc.);
Personal property information (bank account, transaction and consumption records, credit records, virtual property information, etc.);
Other information (trajectory, accurate positioning information, etc.);
Under 14 years old, minor information.
3. Related company: refers to Meituan affiliated company disclosed by Meituan's latest listed company annual report.
Meituan Takeaway and Meituan are related companies.

4. Related account number: You can use the same mobile phone number to log in to the product/services provided by Meituan, and authorize the use of your Meituan account information (such as avatar, nickname, receiving address), so that we can to you based on related accounts to you to youProvide consistent services and unified management.
